Package display

Class CovidTracker

java.lang.Object
display.Display
display.CovidTracker
public class CovidTracker
extends Display
Represents a tracker that keeps track of the number of Covid cases in each Tier
Author:
goldb

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    CovidTracker​(double x, double y, double width, double height)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void draw​(processing.core.PApplet marker)
    Draws the tracker, which is a horizontal bar in which the ratio of the red to the whole bar is proportional to the Covid count out of the total population
    void update​(Tier t)
    Updates the Covid count and total number of people based on the Tier

    Methods inherited from class display.Display

    getFillColor, getHeight, getStrokeColor, getStrokeWeight, getWidth, getX, getY, insideRect, setHeight, setStrokeAndFill, setWidth, setX, setY

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • CovidTracker

      public CovidTracker​(double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the upper left corner of the CovidTracker
      y - the y-coordinate of the upper left corner of the CovidTracker
      width - the width of the CovidTracker
      height - the height of the CovidTracker

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw​(processing.core.PApplet marker)
      Draws the tracker, which is a horizontal bar in which the ratio of the red to the whole bar is proportional to the Covid count out of the total population
      Specified by:
      draw in class Display
      Parameters:
      marker - the PApplet on which the CovidTracker is drawn

    • update

      public void update​(Tier t)
      Updates the Covid count and total number of people based on the Tier
      Parameters:
      t - the current Tier
